alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Grand Forks; Nelson; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Benson, southeastern Towner, southwestern Cavalier, west central Grand Forks, Nelson, Ramsey and northeastern Eddy Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 330 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Maza to near McVille. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... McVille and Pekin around 335 AM CDT. Webster around 355 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Grand Forks; Nelson; Ramsey; Towner
